solution_line_template: There are {days_in_week} days in a week so if she saved half every day except one then she saved half for {days_in_week}-{exception_days} = <<{days_in_week}-{exception_days}={days_saved_half}>>{days_saved_half} days
She saved ${half_saved_amount} for {days_saved_half} days for a total of ${total_saved_half_days}
She saved a quarter once for a total savings of ${quarter_saved_amount}+${total_saved_half_days} = $<<{quarter_saved_amount}+{total_saved_half_days}={total_savings}>>{total_savings}
